data.actual_result: The user will occasionally start typing for 2-4 seconds, then stop, then repeat multiple times
data.expected_result: Nothing should happen, excl. the user appearing offline
data.short_description: After blocking a user, occasionally on the Friends list it will show as they are typing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Block a user - [?] Have the user start typing - Watch online list presence indicator
